data.text: @PublicHealthON when will ontario have the novavax and medicago? my family is in ontario and they want to be vaccinated, but not with mrna since I had an adverse reaction to it
@PublicHealthON Can you please post the data on the recent vaccine deaths? I think transparency is pretty important these days.
@PublicHealthON Stop this drama now. It's been over 2 yrs of pandemic fakery n mockery. End All Mandates Now! Period. We are Done with it.

@PublicHealthON Unfortunately I, and many others, have lost all confidence in your data. Reinstate testing for symptomatic citizens, report the actual situation, and let the public decide if they agree with Doug Ford's declaration DONE WITH COVID.  
@fordnation #VoteFordOut2022
@PublicHealthON but if you select any particular age group, the scale is from last fall. Can you update the age group breakdowns to be more current?

@PublicHealthON Hello, I also sent an email but the response said it could take 15 days to hear back, so I thought i'd put it here too. You seem to have an odd time scaling issue on your Covid-19 Cases by Vaccination Status chart. If you select all ages, the time scale is for the last month;
